verbs.description: [ARG0: The most controversial fighter in UFC , welterweight contender Colby Covington ,] [V: compared] [ARG1: himself] [ARG2: to US President Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in one of the worst ways possible ahead of his interim title fight against former champion Rafael dos Anjos at UFC 225 in Chicago on June 9] .

The most controversial fighter in UFC , welterweight contender Colby Covington , compared himself to US President Donald Trump in one of the worst ways possible ahead of his interim title fight against former champion Rafael [V: dos] [ARG0: Anjos] at UFC 225 in Chicago on June 9 .
